publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-776 Carolyn Leckie: The Success of Michelle McManus-That the Parliament applauds the success of Michelle McManus on becoming the first Scottish female singer to enter the charts at number one with her debut single; believes that her fantastic success story blazes a trail for Scottish women who want to follow their dreams, and further believes that Scotland should be proud and supportive of those shining stars that we have in every community. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, Eleanor Scott*, Frances Curran*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Trish Godman*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-776 Carolyn Leckie: The Success of Michelle McManus-That the Parliament applauds the success of Michelle McManus on becoming the first Scottish female singer to enter the charts at number one with her debut single; believes that her fantastic success story blazes a trail for Scottish women who want to follow their dreams, and further believes that Scotland should be proud and supportive of those shining stars that we have in every community. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Eleanor Scott, Frances Curran, Ms Wendy Alexander, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Trish Godman, Margaret Jamieson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-776 The Success of Michelle McManus (lodged on 12 January 2004) Karen Gillon*
